summary.body: Roof works on Bunyan have just concluded, but there's a ton of stuff that's not quite right ... we've been promised a snagging meeting and commitments to correcting faults etc.  Should we be optimistic that this snagging meeting will yield results, or are we simply venturing forth into a new sea of shifting Technical Services sands?  Any tips for progressing appreciated ...
summary.subject: Roof works - the final frontier?

summary.body: Is it me or is it since the roof works that we have had more flooding in our palaces? I believe that since the roof works and the water drainage system being "redirected" on the 6th floor balconies, we are getting flooded every time. Who would like to support my campaign for a real architect and building firm (not a bunch of lads off a boat from Gdansk) to look at the works, along with English Heritage to see if it can be rectified? ..and if I hear from our Estate office that it is to do with Global Warming or Al Gore from I might slap someone. D07
